remarks: The scalar field of a complex pre-Hilbert space is closed under reciprocal.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphsca.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
cphsca.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cphdivcl $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K /\ B =/= 0 ) ) -> ( A / B ) e. K ) $.
